Class FxImageUtil

java.lang.Object
com.dua3.utility.fx.FxImageUtil
All Implemented Interfaces:
ImageUtil<javafx.scene.image.Image>
public final class FxImageUtil extends Object implements ImageUtil<javafx.scene.image.Image>
Utility class for manipulating JavaFX images.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static FxImageUtil getInstance()
      Returns the instance of FxImageUtil. Only use this if your program uses different implementations of ImageUtil and you specifically need the implementation that is based on the JavaFX Image class. In general, getInstance() should be used.
      Returns:
      the instance of FxImageUtil
